body_html: It's probably a bit more elaborate, but you could use F.unfold/F.fold to get the datapoints and apply the interpolation on that. Then you just have to merge the interpolated and original points. Or you might just write the custom backward kernel for integral upsampling.
body_text:
It's probably a bit more elaborate, but you could use F.unfold/F.fold to get the datapoints and apply the interpolation on that. Then you just have to merge the interpolated and original points.
Or you might just write the custom backward kernel for integral upsampling.
body:
It's probably a bit more elaborate, but you could use F.unfold/F.fold to get the datapoints and apply the interpolation on that. Then you just have to merge the interpolated and original points.
Or you might just write the custom backward kernel for integral upsampling.
